[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-json](./ts-json.md) &gt; [JsonContextHelper](./ts-json.jsoncontexthelper.md) &gt; [extendContext](./ts-json.jsoncontexthelper.extendcontext.md)

## JsonContextHelper.extendContext() method

Static helper to extend context variables and references for a supplied [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static extendContext(baseContext?: IJsonContext | undefined, add?: {
        vars?: VariableValue[];
        refs?: IJsonReferenceMap[];
    }): Result<IJsonContext | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  baseContext | [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) \| undefined | _(Optional)_ The [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) to be extended, or <code>undefined</code> to start from an empty context. |
|  add | { vars?: [VariableValue](./ts-json.variablevalue.md)<!-- -->\[\]; refs?: [IJsonReferenceMap](./ts-json.ijsonreferencemap.md)<!-- -->\[\]; } | _(Optional)_ Optional initializer containing [variable values](./ts-json.variablevalue.md) and/or [reference maps](./ts-json.ijsonreferencemap.md) to be added to the [context](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md)<!-- -->. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) \| undefined&gt;

`Success` with a new [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) containing the variables and references from the base context, merged with and overridden by any that were passed in, or `Failure` with a message if an error occurs.
